title: ship_data
description: contains fuel specific information about transport supply, costs and emissions, as well as other technical information and the aggregated averagr fuel mount of 2015/16
sources.description: Same spread-sheet structure as the ship_data.csv. Contains all deployed original sources to compile the data.

license.name: e.g GNU General Public License 3.0
license.instruction: You are free: To Share, To Create, To Adapt; As long as you: Attribute, Share-Alike, Keep open!

fields.name: fa_PJ
fields.description: fuel amount per ship as the average of 2015/16 in peta-joule

fields.name: ts_Ttkm-MJ
fields.description: specific transport supply in thousand tonne-kilometers per meag-joul fuel

fields.name: cs_€-MJ
fields.description: ship costs in EURO2016 per mega-joule fuel

fields.name: ef-co2-t2p_g-MJ
fields.description: tank-to-propeller carbon dioxide emission factor in gram per mega-joul fuel

fields.name: ef-ch4-t2p_g-MJ
fields.description: tank-to-propeller methane emission factor in gram per mega-joul fuel

fields.name: refit
fields.description: whether a ship can be refitted (yes) or not (no)

fields.name: tier_level
fields.description: nitrogen oxide emission rating as a Tier level

fields.name: scrubber
fields.description: whether a scrubber is installed (yes) or not (no)
